tasks.title: üìÖ sea-net-desktop-v2 - Complete Timeline & Sprint Breakdown
tasks.description:
**Total Timeline: 2 Weeks (14 Days)**

**Week 1: Foundation & Core Features**

**Day 1 (Mon 3 Feb):**
- Sprint Planning & Architecture Review
- Project setup (Vite + React + Tauri)
- Database schema design (Prisma)
- Setup CI/CD pipeline

**Day 2 (Tue 4 Feb):**
- Authentication system
- User Management (CRUD + roles)
- Setup state management (Zustand)

**Day 3 (Wed 5 Feb):**
- Customer Management
- Template Manager (Excel parsing)
- Setup React Hook Form + Zod

**Day 4 (Thu 6 Feb):**
- Booking System (carrier, vessel, voyage)
- Task Management (assignment logic)
- Dashboard overview

**Day 5 (Fri 7 Feb):**
- Testing Week 1
- Bug fixes
- Deploy to staging

**Week 2: Productivity & Polish**

**Day 6 (Mon 10 Feb):**
- Shipment Tracking
- Document Management
- Audit Logging

**Day 7 (Tue 11 Feb):**
- Keyboard shortcuts system
- Dark mode support
- Auto-save forms

**Day 8 (Wed 12 Feb):**
- Advanced search & filters
- Export to Excel
- Toast notifications

**Day 9 (Thu 13 Feb):**
- Export to PDF
- Calendar view
- Analytics dashboard

**Day 10 (Fri 14 Feb):**
- Eamil notifications (SendGrid)
- Activity feed
- Quick actions

**Day 11-12 (Sat-Sun):**
- Integration testing
- Performance optimization
- Documentation

**Day 13-14 (Mon-Tue):**
- Final testing
- Bug fixes
- Production deployment

**Milestones:**
- M1 (Day 5): Foundation complete
- M2 (Day 10): All features implemented
- M3 (Day 14): Production ready

**Deliverables:**
- ‚úÖ Working desktop app
- ‚úÖ User documentation
- ‚úÖ Technical documentation
- ‚úÖ Deployment pipeline

**Timeline Type:** Aggressive 2-week sprint with full weekends
tasks.dod: Complete v2 with all Priority 1-2 features + Priority 3 skeleton

comments.author: PM
comments.text: Aggressive 2-week timeline with full weekend work
